title: False Maps
text: Immediately. Espionage 0-3: May not gain consequences to ignore timers during Exploration missions.

title: Food Shortages
text: Immediately. Stability 0-2: -1 food.

title: Western Front
text: End of Season. Military 0-2: -1 stability.

title: Moonrider Raids
text: Immediately. Sunriders disposition 0-3: May not trade with Sunriders for remainder of season.

title: Sunrider Grain Dispute
text: End of Season. Espionage 0: -2 disposition with Sunriders. Espionage 1-2: -1 disposition with Sunriders.

title: Crescent Hold Calls for Aid
text: End of Season. Subtract 1 from military or drop disposition with Crescent Hold by 1. Subtract 3 from military to burn card.

title: The Mole
text: Immediately. Espionage 0-2: -1 ore.

title: Careless Whispers
text: Immediately. If all secrets have not been found in Eastkeep, -1 espionage.

title: A Growing Bond
text: End of Season. Subtract 1 from sorcery or +1 Apotheosis. Subtract 3 from sorcery to burn card.

title: The Harrowing
text: End of Season. Secrets 0-4: +1 Apotheosis.

title: Farmer Rebellion
text: End of Season. Diplomacy 0-2: Next season produce 2 fewer food.

title: Materials Shortage
text: Immediately. Conquest 0-2: Effect. All survival tests are difficult for the remainder of the season.

title: Restless Spirits
text: Immediately. Spend one sorcery or character with highest Lore must return to Red Bank. Ignore if character with highest Lore already at Red Bank.

title: Darkness on the Steppes
text: End of Season. Sorcery 0-2: -1 disposition with Sunriders.

title: Disgruntled Miners
text: End of Season. Espionage 0-4: -1 disposition with Crescent Hold.

title: Rites of the Blue Robe
text: End of Season. Stability 0-4: -1 disposition with Burgan Vale.

title: Misinformation
text: Immediately. Subtract 1 from espionage or lose 1 secret from Eastkeep. Subtract 3 from espionage to burn card.

title: Holding the Outer Reach
text: End of Season. Subtract 1 from military or North Oaks produces no resources next season. Subtract 3 from military to burn card.

title: The Southkeep Gambit
text: End of Season. Subtract 1 from espionage or +1 Apotheosis. Subtract 3 from espionage to burn card.

title: Ritual of Law
text: End of Season. Secrets 0-8: +1 Apotheosis.

title: Connection Made
text: End of Season. Secrets 0-6: +2 Apotheosis. Secrets 7-12: +1 Apotheosis.

title: The Far Forest
text: End of Season. Secrets 0-8: +2 Apotheosis. Secrets 9-16: +1 Apotheosis.

title: Assassination
text: Character is assassinated.

title: The Sundering
text: End of Season. Secrets 0-10: +2 Apotheosis. Secrets 10-20: +1 Apotheosis.
